channel.title: Need a Host?
channel.description:
[size=14pt][b]Need a Host?[/b][/size]
I will host any server from 317 to 525's protocols. I am currently looking for someone in need of a host, and that has a good source and experience in coding his server.
[b]Requirements:[/b] - Must not LEECH! - Have a stable coding - Great home with thieving IN HOME. (No Tele to thieve!) - Dupes have to be fixed! If they are not, and someone dupes, they will have to be, or i will close the server. - Slayer has to work! Required levels to kill slayer monsters such as abbysal demons must work. - Slayer drops has to be good. - Rock crab training. - Monster teleport to default locations (brimhaven, taverly, etc..) - Nice pking zones! - Shops will have to be edited. I don't want shops to sell whips too cheap etc.. i want people to have a good challenge!
Things to add: Eventualy, those will have to be added by the coder
- Donator Shop - Donator Area - Website for the server with forums and a chatbox - Voting point system (A MUST)
To apply to get the spot, please post screenshots and specifications on your server. I also would like a short description about how long you've been coding, and an email to contact you.

item.title: Need a Host?
item.dc:creator: @the_soul The Soul
item.description:
@the_soul wrote:

No, I don’t. Read the rules.

Read full topic

item.title: Need a Host?
item.dc:creator: @Unik Unik
item.description:
@Unik wrote:

[size=14pt]Need a Host?[/size]

I will host any server from 317 to 525’s protocols. I am currently looking for someone in need of a host, and that has a good source and experience in coding his server.

Requirements:

  • Must not LEECH!
  • Have a stable coding
  • Great home with thieving IN HOME. (No Tele to thieve!)
  • Dupes have to be fixed! If they are not, and someone dupes, they will have to be, or i will close the server.
  • Slayer has to work! Required levels to kill slayer monsters such as abbysal demons must work.
  • Slayer drops has to be good.
  • Rock crab training.
  • Monster teleport to default locations (brimhaven, taverly, etc…)
  • Nice pking zones!
  • Shops will have to be edited. I don’t want shops to sell whips too cheap etc… i want people to have a good challenge!

Things to add: Eventualy, those will have to be added by the coder

  • Donator Shop
  • Donator Area
  • Website for the server with forums and a chatbox
  • Voting point system (A MUST)

To apply to get the spot, please post screenshots and specifications on your server. I also would like a short description about how long you’ve been coding, and an email to contact you.

Read full topic
